page.title: 19A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: My name is Clair Louise Booth and I am 8 years old and I start my day by being woken by my mum at 7:30.I always stay in bed for another quarter of an hour because I am lazy.When I get up I put on my school uniform:-a blue skirt ,a blue and white T-shirt anda grey cardigan and then I have my breakfast. After breakfast I go outside to feed my pet guinea-pig Annabell then I come inside and brush my hair,clean my teeth and walk to school.The teacher takes the register which is a long list of all the people in the class. After register we line up to go into assembly.Assembly ends at 9:20 and we go back to our classroom. At 12:00 we have lunch.After lunch we read until 1:30.Then group 1 for swimming get changed and vice versa we go home at 3:30.
